title: A comprehensive investigation of voter impersonation finds 31 credible incidents out of one billion ballots cast
text: By Justin Levitt Note: This is a guest post by Justin Levitt , a professor at the Loyola Law School, Los Angeles and an expert in constitutional law and the law of democracy, with a particular focus on election administration and redistricting . Most read 1 Dan Diamond and Paige Winfield Cunningham GOP plans to replace Obamacare have failed. Here’s what lawmakers propose now. 2 Column Ben Noll and Daniel Wolfe How snowy could it be where you live this winter? Look up your area. 3 Terrence McCoy One man’s obsessive quest to uncover Brazil’s buried Nazi past 4 Ethan Beck SNL takes on the Epstein files as Glen Powell hosts 5 Column Paul Kane GOP-led Epstein probe in House creates political friendly fire for Trump Sign up
